channel.title: Softlayer_notification_occurrence_user on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_notification_occurrence_user on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_User
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_User Service Datatype Description Methods acknowledge Acknowledge the associated [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]] for this impacted user. getAllObjects Returns a collection of impacted users, an account master user has the ability to see all impacted users under the account. getImpactedDeviceCount A count representing the number of the user's devices currently impacted by the associated event will be returned. getImpactedResources Retrieve a collection of resources impacted by the associated event.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_User
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_User Datatype Description This type contains general information relating to a user that may be impacted by a [[SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Event]]. Local acknowledgedFlag Type: integer active Type: integer id Type: integer usrRecordId Type: integer Relational impactedResources A collection of resources impacted by the associated event. Type: SoftLayer_Notification_Occurrence_Resource[] notificationOccurrenceEvent The associated event.
